anonymous_cids.description: a list of Caller ID Names and Caller ID Numbers that indicate an incoming call is anonymous

check_anonymous_names.description: use the anonymous_cids values to check if a name is anonymous

check_anonymous_numbers.description: use the anonymous_cids values to check if a number is anonymous

privacy_mode.description: Default privacy mode for anonymous calls

privacy_name.description: Default Caller ID Name should be shown for anonymous calls

privacy_number.description: Default Caller ID Number should be shown for anonymous calls
